existing_features.title: Update the Dashboard header measurements section so that when there is no Weekly measurements data, the UI does not render the fallback text "No data yet" under the "Weekly" label.
Update the Dashboard header measurements section so that when there is no Monthly measurements data, the UI does not render the fallback text "No data yet" under the "Monthly" label.
If both Weekly and Monthly measurements have no data, ensure the header measurements row does not leave an empty placeholder gap on the Dashboard (i.e., it should collapse to minimal/zero height).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the UI text/labels under Nuvio for Weekly/Monthly that say "No data yet" (e.g., "weekly no data yet", "monthly no data yet")

projectName: Remove 'No data yet' text under Weekly/Monthly measurements on Dashboard header
